snippet: Senator Charles E. Schumer is expected to press Chuck Hagel on Iran and Israel in a talk this week that could sway others about whether to support the nominee for defense secretary.
abstract: Former Sen Chuck Hagel will meet with Sen Charles E Schumer, most influential Jewish member of Senate, who is expected to press Hagel on issues concerning Iran and Israel; meeting may be crucial moment in Obama administration's efforts to advance nomination of Hagel as secretary of defense.
lead_paragraph: Senator Charles E. Schumer is expected to press Chuck Hagel on Iran and Israel in a talk this week that could sway others about whether to support the nominee for defense secretary.

headline.seo: Schumer to Meet With Hagel Over Policy Issues
headline.main: Hagel to Meet Schumer to Discuss Policy Issues
headline.print_headline: Hagel to Meet Schumer As Part of His Campaign To Win Over the Senate

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
